info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:47AM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR BRADLEY...CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN GRANT...CALHOUN...EASTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN OUACHITA COUNTIES... At 247 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carthage to near Fordyce to near Hampton Municipal Airport, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Warren... Fordyce... Rison... Hampton... Hermitage... Kingsland... Thornton... Carthage... Harrell... Ingalls... Ellisville... Hilo... Lamont... Hampton Municipal Airport... Hebron... Kedron... Weeks... Mt Elba... Tipton... Marks Mill State Park... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
